Source code for pymagic.cred_tools

"""
Functions for interacting with credentials & security.

"""

import os



[docs]def proxies(domain):
    """
    A function to create an http/https proxy address.

    :param domain: domain address.
    :return: Http/https proxy address.
    """
    res = {'http': 'http://' + \
                   os.environ['usr'] + \
                   ':' + os.environ['pwd'] + \
                   f'@proxyfarm.{domain}.com:8080',

           'https': 'https://' + \
                    os.environ['usr'] + \
                    ':' + os.environ['pwd'] + \
                    f'@proxyfarm.{domain}.com:8080'}

    return res
